title: Prince Heer - MBA Portfolio
text:
Prince Heer Headshot


Hi! I‚Äôm Prince Heer, an MBA candidate at University Canada West, graduating in September 2025. With a background in Commerce (B.Com) and a strong interest in finance, strategy, and innovation, I aim to bridge analytical thinking with practical solutions.
Currently, I work at Armour Security & Protection Services, where I support strategic planning, financial management, and operational efficiency.



This website showcases my professional journey, academic projects, and skillsets as part of my MBA portfolio.

title: About Me
text:
I‚Äôm Prince Heer, currently pursuing my MBA at University Canada West, with an expected graduation in September 2025. I hold a Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com) from Shri Guru Gobind Singh Khalsa College, Punjab, India.
My passion lies at the intersection of finance, strategy, and innovation. I strive to create data-driven solutions that support business decision-making and growth.



I‚Äôm currently employed at Armour Security & Protection Services (since September 2024), where I lead strategic and operational initiatives including:

Optimizing service delivery and resource planning.
Supporting financial forecasting, analysis, and reporting.
Contributing to client satisfaction and performance tracking.





I aim to advance into roles involving:

Financial Strategy

Business Consulting

Corporate Planning or Operations Leadership

With continuous learning and practical experience, I‚Äôm building a foundation to become a dynamic and insightful business professional.

title: Projects & Case Studies
text:
Led team strategy in a multi-round banking simulation. Key responsibilities:

Managed interest rates, capital ratios, and loan portfolios

Analyzed competition and adjusted strategy

Delivered final report summarizing performance, risks, and lessons learned




Researched and presented a report on how blockchain enhances transparency in logistics and supply chains. Highlights:

Reduced fraud and transaction delays

Case studies: Walmart, IBM Food Trust




Developed a strategic advertising plan for Netflix‚Äôs entry into ad-supported streaming. Work included:

Audience segmentation

Budget planning

Campaign objectives and metrics


More academic or professional projects will be added as I progress through the MBA.
